name: Disarming Threat Deed

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Amateur Swashbuckler or panache class feature; Diplomacy 2 ranks, Intimidate 2 ranks.

sections.text: When you succeed at an Intimidate check to force an opponent to act friendly toward you, you can spend 1 panache point to cause the target to regard you with indifference when the duration of the effect expires. A target influenced in this manner is unlikely to report you to authorities.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: An opponent forced to act friendly toward you by Intimidate becomes unfriendly when the duration expires, and is likely to report you to the authorities.
sections.name: Normal

prerequisites: Amateur Swashbuckler or panache class feature
description: Even your threats are curiously charming.
